document.full_text: serbian authorities detained 180 people who had attacked police injuring 32 during a protest against the arrest of bosnian serb wartime general ratko mladic, an interior ministry spokeswoman said on monday.
document.title: serbian police detain 180 in pro-mladic violence
lines_and_colors: serbian authorities detained 180 people who had attacked police injuring 32 during a protest against the arrest of bosnian serb wartime general ratko mladic, an interior ministry spokeswoman said on monday.
